The twins were walking through the local mall, they were approaching a new business that had just opened . It was a new ice cream shop that sold new and unusual ice cream flavors.

Standing in front of the store was a man pacing back and forth, looking very anxious. He was wearing a chefs hat and an apron.

As they walked by they both said "Hello" in unison.

"Hello children" the man said in reply, shaking their hands. "My name is Tony and I run this here ice cream parlor. I was wondering if you two would be interested in a business proposition I have?"

"Sure" Zack said rather quickly.

"Zack, you don't even know what he wants" snapped Cody. "What exactly is it sir?"

" Well" Tony stated, "The main point of my business is to make and sell new and exciting ice cream flavors that no one else has. However many of my customers are children and I don't know what children like. So I need a couple of children to be taste testers, what do you say?"

One twin say's yes, the other say's no.

"Okay" Tony replied. "I could have certainly used two people, but I suppose one will do. Just follow me and I'll explain everything. You can wait here" Tony pointed to a chair.

Zack disappeared behind the 'Staff Only' door.

Cody sat and waited. After a while he started thinking. "Taste tester...that means Zack will be eating a lot of ice cream, that won't exactly help his weighty situation."

Cody calmed himself down and continued to wait. After waiting ten minutes Zack appeared eating a large triple scoop ice cream. "French Silk Pie" said Zack as he finished off the ice cream. 1211.content:

After a boring day of school full of math equations, science experiments and history lectures that put Zack to sleep, Zack and Cody headed off to Tony's to get a start on their first day of work.

Once in the back room of the shop, Tony stood in front of the two who were dressed in proper uniform (red polo shirts and denim shorts, both of the same size. Zack's was already a little snug around the waist) and explained to them what to do.

"So each day there will be 10 new ice cream flavors for you to try, you must eat and finish 3 scoops of each, also feel free to help yourself to more. After trying each kind fill out the evaluation sheets. You will get a $0.50 raise every two weeks, starting out at $15 an hour. Enjoy!"


Tony left them to it.

"I'll take these five first" said Zack licking his lips.

"Is that it Cody? Poor effort" taunted Zack who was leaning back in his chair waiting.

Zack and Cody took off their uniforms and headed home.

12112211112211.content:
Two weeks later, the swimming competition came along.

Zack stood in front of the mirror and flexed his arms. He had deluded himself into thinking he had a six pack and muscular arms, when in actuality, he had grown fatter than ever. He'd munched, snacked and glutted himself at Tony's and had stuffed his face every night when Carey and Cody were asleep. He had deluded himself and Carey in to thinking that he was eating more because he needed more energy to train for the swimming competition; in actuality, his gluttony had been on an eating spree and he had piled on weight.

Cody, like Zack, had gained weight; he had not dieted at all, but as long as he was skinnier than Zack, he didn't care; he, like his brother, had munched, snacked and glutted himself at Tony's but had not stuffed his face at night and was ten pounds lighter than his ever fattening brother.

"Perfect!" Zack exclaimed, flexing in the mirror again "A muscular six pack and a muscular arms. Cody, you're going down!"
"I don't think so," Cody replied "I'm going to win; you'll see! You haven't gained muscle, but have gotten fat instead."
"Ha!" Laughed Zack "You're just afraid of putting on your speedo as you know you've grown too fat for it!"
Cody snatched his speedo off of Zack, who began to change into his; Cody slipped his speedo on and felt a pang of tightness.
"Oof!" Groaned Cody "It's worse than I thought."
"What did I say?" Laughed Zack, turning to Cody "You're too fat for your speedo! You look like a stuffed sausage! Maybe if you'd gone on a diet, like you'd intended to, then it'd fit better."
While Cody's speedo was only tight on him, Zack's was straining and his immense belly hung over it, wobbling with every step he took. They pulled on their clothes and got a cab to the leisure centre.
The two changed out of their clothes and readied themselves on the diving board. All of the other competitors had thick rippling muscles and Zack and Cody looked very fat compared to them.
The horn sounded and everyone leaped into the water. Cody felt himself sink to the bottom and began kicking his legs to push himself upwards. Zack, heavier than Cody, sunk a little further and kicked his legs desperately. As he reached the surface of the water, he saw Cody a little way ahead, his legs kicking desperately to haul his fattened frame around. Zack kicked his legs and began to swim after Cody, but after only a few yards, had to raise a hand to be rescued by the life guards as his weight had began to pull him downwards and he was growing tired.
A few moments later, Cody too, was hauled out of the water. Zack, being first to be hauled out of the water, graciously conceded defeat and he and Cody headed to the changing rooms to dry off before changing, getting in cab and driving to MacDonalds where they stuffed their faces on burgers.
"Well, what do we tell Mum?" Cody inquired, as he finished his first meal.
"That we came in second and third." Zack replied "That way, we don't have to show her a trophy."
"So, do you believe me when I say you've gotten fat?"
"Yes," Zack conceded "I do. I've packed on a few pounds, but so have you, and it's not my fault you're bigger. You took that job, you should fear the consequences."
"So should you, chubby" said Cody, who took a bite out of his second burger, which was placed in front of him "I should go on a diet."
"Yeah, eating a burger...what a great way to start" said Zack.
"The best way is by weighing myself first, I'll slow down gradually on the junk. Then I'll go on a diet...after a bowl of ice cream....or some fries...mmmmm...I'm sure I can eat in moderation."
"Let's go to those scales" said Zack.
He threw the rubbish in the bin and took out a few dollars. He and Cody headed out of the MacDonalds, which was in the mall, and across to the Doctor's office, where there was a scale that anyone could use. Zack inserted a dollar into the machine.
"When did we last weigh ourselves?" Asked Zack.
"We were at the doctors two months ago" said Cody. "I was one hundred and twenty eight pounds, you were one hundred and thirty six."
"Fine, I'm sure I'll be ok now."
Zack inserted the number fourteen into the machine for his age, followed by his previous weight of 136 pounds. The machine read HEALTHY WEIGHT. He then stepped on. The scales shot to a result instantly - 157 pounds.
"Well, well...twenty one pounds in two months, you probably gained one and a half stone when you started working at Tony's two months ago. Man, check what the scale says!"
The words ALMOST OVERWEIGHT were in bright red letters above Zack's reading.
"So what, my extra pounds are part of me now.It'll be gone next semester. Your turn, Mr Skinny..."
Chuckling, Cody inserted his money and got on the scale. He typed his age, and then his old weight of 128 pounds. The scale read ALMOST UNDERWEIGHT.
"See, I needed to gain a little anyway" smiled Cody, rubbing his gut. The scale went up to....- 144 pounds. Cody gulped nervously and waited for the machine reading. It came as BEYOND HEALTHY WEIGHT.
"Oh...errmmm....I must have taken it a little too far." groaned Cody, stepping off. He raised his shirt again and looked at his gut, concerned. His flat stomach wasn't there anymore, it had become bigger and more noticeable. But while Cody's sweater vest only revealed a trace of his overeating, Zack's T-shirt was under strain. It didn't quite cover him and it showed every pound of his weight gain.
"Not exactly super-fit are you?" said Zack.
"Oh shut up. My extra sixteen pounds are a little more spread out than your whopping twenty one."
"Hey, we've both gained more than a stone" snorted Zack. "If your not careful, you might get bigger!"

The waitress was shocked, but she went back to the kitchen to give the large order to the chef. Zack finished up the last of his eggs while his order arrived, and he began to eat again.

After finishing his second meal, he decided he was full. He paid the bill and walked out to a cab, which drove him back to the tipton.

Zack entered his suite, to find only Cody snacking on some granola bars. "Where did you go?" Cody asked.
"IHop, had a huge meal," Zack smiled at the thought. He went to the fridge, pulled out a carton of ice cream and a spoon. He plopped himself next to Cody and began eating the ice cream.

Cody rolled his eyes. "Why cant he see how fat he's getting?" Cody thought to himself. "How can I make him realize..." Cody began devising a plan to show how unhealthy he is, so he can turn around his eating habits. Cody kept thinking while he munched on his bag of chips.

"I'll do it," Cody said immediately.

"Alright then. Well kid, come with me and we can get started," Tony said to Cody.

"Thank you! I will be right there in a minute," Cody said while Tony walked away.

"So why aren't you doing this?" Cody asked to his brother wondering what the answer may be.

"Well I want to maintain my weight a little. Obviously, I'm the bigger of the two. I want to lose some weight so I can skateboard for now and snowboard soon. Winter is around the corner," Zack said as he patted his small gut, which he knew made him about fifteen pounds heavier than Cody.

"So are you saying I'm going to become fat?" Cody asked offensively.

"No! I mean, you could, but I'm just saying that I don't want the chance of getting any bigger. Just watch your portions. Heck, you're the smarter one anyway," Zack said, which made Cody grin with some cockiness.

"That's right. I am. Don't worry. I'll be fine," Cody said with a grin.

"I'll meet you back at the hotel," Zack said as he began to walk away.

"And I am going to make some serious cash," Cody said with a cocky grin.

Cody Martin, a younger twin looking identical as much as his blonde hair in all, but he was all in his smart side with straight A's at school, smart with his sweatshirt he always were in different circumstances. The problem of not looking identical is the size of themselves. He was on the healthy side, looking after his body in healthy foods and has no trouble with his weight, it's his brother named, Zack is the problem of its scheme, and here's why:

Zack is a lazy town than his brother. He may be older, but not wise as far as his attitude goes. No straight A's expect, he'll mostly receiving the F's, whatever the matter he's on. He's eating junk food and puts on more weight than Cody's as far as comparison was concerned, and that's when Cody had to take in the matter in his hands.

He wanted to give Zack the example on how life can be if he continues to eat junk food and gaining weight as much as he feels like it. That's when he decided to build his inventions made at Arwin's basement to work on. Although, he may have some help from the janitor himself, Cody was even finished it just two weeks into the scheme. It looked like a remote controller, but what it does is it makes food into fattened calories of amount when it zapped by a button in the middle. It looked pretty straight forward, and Cody wanted to see the results in person, and he's looking forward to get his hands on his brother's fate.

131.content:
As Zack was getting up to get to the kitchen, Cody pointed the remote at the tall stack of pancakes he made and pressed the red button, raising the amount of calories in the pancakes. In fact the pancakes now had five times the amount of calories. Cody was really proud of the remote, as he could even use the remote through some surfaces, meaning that he could use it under the table if need be. Regardless, Zack showed up in the kitchen, still in his boxers as it was Saturday. In fact, lately, Zack rarely got dressed on weekends, as he preferred to laze around the house.

Zack's eyes lit up when he saw the stack of pancakes, and he said "You sure know me, Cody!". Then he brought the entire stack in front of him and began working on it, taking huge forkfuls. Cody made himself a couple separate pancakes, and he began eating those. Carey was working all day for a special event at the hotel, meaning the boys had the suite to themselves.

Zack gorged himself on the pancakes without a care in the world. There were quite a few pancakes, so when Zack was finished his belly stuck out a decent amount, and he patted it, satisfied. Cody was amazed by how much Zack could eat, and he knew that if he kept his plan up, then Zack would realize what eating like that could lead to.

Zack laid on the couch, watching TV all day. Cody stayed in the suite and hung out with him to make sure that he could use the remote every chance he got. Every time Zack got himself a snack, Cody made sure to use the remote on it when he wasn't looking. Even as the day ended, Cody was starting to notice some effects. Zack's belly was a bit bigger, and his boxers seemed a little tighter on his growing ass.

Zack didn't notice, however, and he kept eating at his leasure.

Throughout the week, Cody made sure he pointed the remote at everything that Zack ate. Cody was getting good at being subtle, and Zack was oblivious. Cody would even use the remote on Zack's lunches at school. Carey had noticed Zack getting pudgier, but she decided not to say anything yet.

That Friday afternoon, Zack and Cody were getting home from school. Zack was now noticeably fatter, and he could barely put on his pants in the morning anymore. In addition, his shirt was now tight around his growing belly and moobs.

Zack and Cody went to their room, and Zack quickly began taking off his clothes, as they were starting to get uncomfortable. Cody watched as Zack pulled off his shirt, his belly cascading out to cover his waistband. Zack then took off his jeans, and his fly practically tore open as he unbuttoned them. Zack took off his socks, and returned to being clad only in his boxers. Cody was wondering what was going through Zack's mind right now.
